## Schnelligkeit 

```{r,eval=F}
install.packages("inline")
```


```{r}
library(inline)
src<- 'int n = as<int>(ns);
double x = as<double>(xs);
for (int i=0; i<n; i++) x=1/(1+x);
return wrap(x);'
```

```{r}
l<- cxxfunction(signature(ns="integer",
xs="numeric"),body=src, plugin="Rcpp")
```



## Das R-Paket CPP 

- [Make your R simulation models 20 times faster](https://www.r-bloggers.com/make-your-r-simulation-models-20-times-faster/)

- [High performance functions with Rcpp](http://adv-r.had.co.nz/Rcpp.html)


```{r,eval=F}
install.packages("Rcpp")
```

```{r,eval=F}
library(Rcpp)
cppFunction('int add(int x, int y, int z) {
  int sum = x + y + z;
  return sum;
}')
# add works like a regular R function
add
```

```{r,eval=F}
add(1, 2, 3)
```
